units.report:
Morning Air attack on Tuguegarao , at 82,74 
 
Weather in hex: Clear sky
 
Raid spotted at 16 NM, estimated altitude 19,000 feet.
Estimated time to target is 4 minutes
 
Japanese aircraft
      Ki-48-Ib Lily x 27
 
No Japanese losses
 
Airbase hits 5
Airbase supply hits 1
Runway hits 8
 
Aircraft Attacking:
      27 x Ki-48-Ib Lily bombing from 15000 feet
               Airfield Attack:  4 x 100 kg GP Bomb
F1M2 Pete sighting report: 3 Allied ships at 89,95 near Babeldaob, speed 17, Moving Southeast
